description:
fast cooling of the rotor and low energy consumption
3-layer sealed rotors ensure safe centifugation
Brushless motor drive, maintenance free
Safety features include door interlock; excessive speed and temperature detection; automatic self-diagnostics
Outstanding aluminum alloy rotors fully autoclavable at 121℃ temperature and high pressure disinfection
Five rotors are optional complete with 24 places 1.5/2.0mL tubes,5.0mL, 0.2mL and 0.5mL tubes with adapters
PRODUCT PARAMETERS
Cat.No.
9033000121
Speed range
15000rpm(200-15000rpm), increment:10rpm
Max. RCF
21380×g, increment:10×g
Speed accuracy
±20 rpm
Rotor type
-
Rotor capacity
1.5/2mL ×24 | 0.2/0.5mL ×36 | PCR-8 strips×4 | 5mL ×12 | 5mL×18
Run time
30sec-99min/Continuous
Acceleration/Braking time
25s↑25s↓
Temperature setting range
-
Display
LCD
Power
200W
Voltage/Frequency
Single-phase, AC200V-400V, 50Hz/60Hz, 5A,AC100V-120V, 50Hz/60Hz, 8A
Noise level
≤64dB
Motor type
Brushless DC motor
Dimensions[WxDxH]
364×280×266mm
Weight
12kg
Safety performance
Dual door interlock, Over-speed detection, Automatic internal diagnosis
Other functions
Speed/RCF switch; Short-time run function; sound-alert function MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Centrifuges in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Centrifuges with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
